category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_prompt_to_delete_occurrences
preference.preference_description: Activate the prompt setting for deleting occurrences, to prompt users to select the occurrences to delete. If you choose not to activate the prompt, all occurrences will be deleted. The Prompt to Delete Occurrences setting can be customized within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value is false
